divs: Sighting DetailsWas sitting on back deck looking up at the sky, looking at the constellation Ursa Major when it appeared. It was like a yellowish orange glow like it was on the bottom of something, shot straight then took a left hook so to say. About 10-20 minutes after jets seem to patrol that certain spot, seen the same jet do a patrol so to say about 3 takes around then zoomed off.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Davenport
There were no other sightings in Davenport on or around June 27th 2013
Summary: Looked like it appeared from bottom corner of Ursa Major
